recipe.title: Harry's Strawberry and Tomato Salad
ingredients: 1 cup (about 1/2 pound whole berries) small strawberries, trimmed and halved
1 tablespoon finely grated lemon zest (about 1 lemon)
2 heads Boston lettuce, halved and cores removed
instructions: In small mixing bowl, toss together tomatoes, strawberries, oil, vinegar, zest, salt, and pepper. Let marinate at room temperature 10 minutes.
To serve, place lettuce-head halves on 4 plates. Top each with tomato-strawberry mixture. Sprinkle with chives.
